description:
cmd/go: fix 'go help'
It depended on old behavior of functions in structs.
Solved by adding a boolean method to check .Run != nil.

messages.text:
On Feb 16, 2012, at 1:01 PM, Andrew Gerrand wrote:

> LGTM
> 
> Surprising that a non-nil func isn't truthy, though.

you misunderstand.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as 2af1404b241a ***

cmd/go: fix 'go help'
It depended on old behavior of functions in structs.
Solved by adding a boolean method to check .Run != nil.

R=golang-dev, adg, r, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5674062

LGTM

Surprising that a non-nil func isn't truthy, though.

Fixes Issue 3028?
